fees.description: A $126.29 (GST Incl) fee may apply when your property is reconnected (including when you move). Fee may vary.
A $126.29 (GST Incl) fee may apply when your property is disconnected (including when you move). Fee may vary.
A fee of $15.00 (GST exempt) may apply if your bill is not paid by the due date.
A 0.27% fee (GST Incl) may apply to payments made by VISA debit card.
A 0.65% fee (GST Incl) may apply to payments made by VISA credit card.
A 0.33% fee (GST Incl) may apply to payments made by Mastercard debit card.
A 0.67% fee (GST Incl) may apply to payments made by Mastercard credit card.
If you pay at an Australia Post outlet, a payment processing fee of the higher of $2.70 or 0.49% (incl GST) may apply.
A 0.64% fee (GST Incl) may apply to payments made by American Express credit card.

electricityContract.terms: You must be on the Origin Loop VPP Origin Battery Maximiser. Your Solar system must be net metered and you must not be receiving a feed-in tariff under any government scheme. Premises cannot rely on electricity for life support or other critical needs.
electricityContract.variation: We may vary the Charges (including their amount, nature and structure) by notice to you at any time. The notice will be at least 5 business days prior to the effective date of the variation.

eligibility.description: To be eligible for this Energy Plan you must meet the eligibility requirements and the conditions precedent set out in clause 2 of the Origin Loop Terms and Conditions (Terms) and enter into the Contract as detailed in the Terms. You must continue to meet the eligibility requirements set out in clause 2 of the Terms. For more, refer to https://www.originenergy.com.au/wp-content/uploads/262/Origin-Loop-Battery-Maximiser-Terms-and-Conditions-signed-off-301024.pdf
Offer available to residential customers with eligible network tariff. Call us on 13 24 61 to determine eligibility and available tariff options.

greenPowerCharges.description: For 1.13 cents/kWh 25% of your electricity usage is matched with electricity from Government accredited GreenPower sources
For 2.25 cents/kWh 50% of your electricity usage is matched with electricity from Government accredited GreenPower sources
For 4.50 cents/kWh 100% of your electricity usage is matched with electricity from Government accredited GreenPower sources

solarFeedInTariff.description: Origin offers 22 cents per kWh during Peak hours between 5pm to 9 pm all days.
For the remaining Off-Peak hours between 9pm to 5pm, Origin Offers 6 cents per kWh.

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: At the end of the benefit period we may extend your current Energy Plan or set you up with a new Energy Plan but only if we have written to you first and you havent told us not to
electricityContract.additionalFeeInformation: You must pay us any charges your distributor imposes on us in relation to services performed by your distributor (or anyone else) at your supply address. For details on additional charges that may apply see www.originenergy.com.au/2402/Additional-charges
